headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://assets.calendly.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; frame-src https://calendly.com https://*.calendly.com; connect-src 'self' https://calendly.com https://*.calendly.com https://assets.calendly.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://assets.calendly.com;
